person.bio: Olivia is a Co-Founder of the THREEFOLD LOVE initiative, with a mission of digital inclusion by empowering communities through the use of ThreeFold technologies. Olivia is an eco-socialpreneur and serial volunteer. Living each day in mindful ways in an attempt to get back to a manner of living that is more harmonious with nature, while trying Â to find a balance between high tech and low tech living.Spreading the love...into the fold. Co-Founder fell in love with Threefold I am happy to support the ThreeFold mission to cultivate the infrastructure for a new, secure, green & neutral internet for all because it is galvanized by dedication and a true love of people and our planet.
person.excerpt: Olivia is a Co-Founder of the THREEFOLD LOVE initiative.
